meanings.sent1: She was togging up for the party, putting on her best dress.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he enjoys togging himself in his favorite outfit.
meanings.sent3: The cat was togging itself in a tiny hat, looking quite dapper.
meanings.sent4: The sun was togging the sky in vibrant hues as it set over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: Togging the scarecrow in colorful clothes made it stand out in the field.

meanings.sent1: Her closet was full of colorful togging for every occasion.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide selection of togging for all seasons.
meanings.sent3: The togging on the mannequin seemed to be dancing in the window display.
meanings.sent4: The togging of the performers on stage added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The knight's togging gleamed in the sunlight as he rode into battle.
